main event: On May 17, 1964, a bright flying object was observed in the Atlantic at a medium altitude moving from northwest to southeast.
interesting points: The sighting was recorded under Project Blue Book, an official U.S. Air Force program investigating UFOs., The object was reported to be flying at a medium altitude and no speed was estimated., The conclusion stated that the sighting could be a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical object, but insufficient data for full evaluation., The sighting location was given as 38.0°N, 42.38°W in the Atlantic Ocean., The report emphasizes that the observations were classified as ground-visual.
